::Zardus::

Zardus nods, frowning. A spark container wasn't in any way important, since there were many in the lab, but why would Orchestra want one? Zardus didn't really believe the bot's exuse of research, but he didn't see anything bad about sparing one for better relations with the Predacons.

"Yes, you can have one. I have something to take care of, so I have to go."

He looks at Wheeljack. "You can give him one of the spark containers in the equipment room next to here. If something comes up, contact me."

Zardus turns around, leaving the room and heading for the docking bay.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> ::Orchestra/Composer::
> 
> Composer looked at Zardus, but didn't stay anything.
> 
> "Uh, yes," Orchestra said, "I don't mean to look like a thief or a moocher,
> but, I was wondering if I could borrow a spark container."
